About Me

A bit about who I am and what I do

The Unconventional Path

Hi, I'm Anna -it's nice to meet you! My journey as a developer started way back when I was 11 years old and absolutely obsessed with a website called Neopets. I designed layouts for my guilds and taught myself how to code their bits and pieces. Almost twenty years later, it took graduating from the University of Minnesota with a B.Sc. in Nutrition & Dietetics, living in 3 different states and 3 different countries for me to realize that front end development and design are what make my clock tick. Now, after many hours of self-teaching, I am ready to combine my passion for user centered design with the vision you have for your website

My Creative Process

My UX/UI design projects follow a dedicated path to rope in your results

1

Discuss The Project

Whether it's over a cappucino, a zoom call, or a quick check-in over text, no logistical detail is left unturned.

2

Brainstorming

I work to understand my clients' visions before strategizing to understand key competitors and how my clients will stand apart.

3

UI/UX Planning

Throughout the planning process, I dedicate extra measures to ensure that my websites are both user friendly and client approved

4

Editing & Support

My work is never done until the full editing process is complete. Even after the final thumbs up, I stay in touch with my clients to ensure long-term contentment.
